name: swift-selection-search
title: Swift Selection Search
description: Swiftly access your search engines in a popup panel when you select text in a webpage. Context search menu also included!
author: Daniel Lobo

preferences.name: popupPanelOpenBehavior
preferences.title: Popup panel opening behaviour
preferences.description:
When to open the popup panel.
(default: Auto)

options.label: Keyboard-only (with text already selected, press the key combination set below)

preferences.name: popupPanelHotkey
preferences.title: Key combination to open popup panel
preferences.description:
You must use at least one of these: shift, control, alt, meta (Mac Command), accel (Control on Windows/Linux, Command on Mac). Clear the text box to disable the hotkey.
(default: accel-shift-space, which means Ctrl+Shift+Spacebar on Windows/Linux and Cmd+Shift+Spacebar on Mac)

preferences.name: popupPanelDisableHotkey
preferences.title: Key combination to disable popup panel
preferences.description:
Changes the "Popup panel opening behaviour" option to Off and then back when pressed again. Use this when the popup is getting in the way of your browsing or text writing.
(default: accel-shift-x, which means Ctrl+Shift+X on Windows/Linux and Cmd+Shift+X on Mac)

preferences.name: popupLocation
preferences.title: Popup location
preferences.description:
Where the popup should appear after selecting text.
(default: Bottom right corner of selection "rectangle")

preferences.name: hidePopupPanelOnPageScroll
preferences.title: Hide popup panel on page scroll
preferences.description:
Hides the popup panel when the page moves.
(default: On)

preferences.name: hidePopupPanelOnSearch
preferences.title: Hide popup panel on search engine click
preferences.description:
Hides the popup panel when a search engine is clicked.
(default: On)

preferences.name: openEngineManager
preferences.title: Manage your search engines
preferences.description: Opens Firefox's search engines manager. To select which engines are shown in the popup panel, use the "Select from available search engines", below.
preferences.label: Manage

preferences.name: selectEnginesButton
preferences.title: Select from available search engines
preferences.description: Enable/disable the search engines that are displayed on the popup panel (the context menu still shows all of them).
preferences.label: Select

preferences.name: mouseLeftButtonBehavior
preferences.title: Left mouse button behaviour
preferences.description:
What to do when a search engine is clicked with the left mouse button.
(default: Open in this tab)

preferences.name: mouseMiddleButtonBehavior
preferences.title: Middle mouse button behaviour
preferences.description:
What to do when a search engine is clicked with the middle mouse button.
(default: Open in new background tab)

preferences.name: popupPanelAnimationDuration
preferences.title: Panel animation duration
preferences.description:
Duration of panel animation, in milliseconds. 0 ms makes panel show instantly.
(default: 200)

preferences.name: itemSize
preferences.title: Icon size
preferences.description:
Search engine icon size in pixels.
(default: 24)

preferences.name: itemPadding
preferences.title: Icon padding
preferences.description:
Search engine icon horizontal padding in pixels.
(default: 2)

preferences.name: useSingleRow
preferences.title: Use single row
preferences.description:
Place all search engines in a single row?
(default: On)

preferences.name: nItemsPerRow
preferences.title: Number of icons per row
preferences.description:
Max number of search engines per row (if "Use single row" is off).
(default: 4)

preferences.name: itemHoverBehavior
preferences.title: Icon hover behaviour
preferences.description:
What happens to hovered search engine icons.
(default: Highlight & Move)

preferences.name: popupPaddingX
preferences.title: Popup panel horizontal padding
preferences.description:
Popup panel left/right padding, in pixels.
(default: 3)

preferences.name: popupPaddingY
preferences.title: Popup panel vertical padding
preferences.description:
Popup panel top/bottom padding, in pixels.
(default: 1)

preferences.name: doHorizontalCentering
preferences.title: Do horizontal centering
preferences.description:
Whether or not to centre the popup panel horizontally.
(default: On)

preferences.name: enableEnginesInContextMenu
preferences.title: Enable engines in context menu
preferences.description:
Adds a sub-menu with all search engines when you right click a text selection.
(default: On)

preferences.name: contextMenuItemBehavior
preferences.title: Context menu item behaviour
preferences.description:
What to do when a search engine is clicked in the context menu.
(default: Open in this tab)

preferences.name: autoCopyToClipboard
preferences.title: Auto copy to clipboard
preferences.description:
Automatically copy selected text.
(default: Off)
